description: Experiment LO3 is a powerful, nearly unkillable creature, a hybrid of human and reptile, with a high sex drive and complete submission to her creator.  She hates all creatures except her creator, whom she loves intensely and obeys without question, even refraining from attacking others at his command.  Despite being unable to speak, she has a complex inner monologue and understands human language. She is kept in a secure room, making escape attempts but always returning to her creator.
